```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
```

```{r}
biopsy <- read_csv("biopsy12.csv")

biopsy <- biopsy %>%
  mutate(class = as.factor(class))
```



```{r}
log_reg <- logistic_reg() %>%
  set_engine("glm")

log_reg_wf <- workflow() %>%
  add_formula(class ~ V4) %>%
  add_model(log_reg)

log_reg_fit <- log_reg_wf %>%
  fit(biopsy)

tidy(log_reg_fit)
```
1. The estimated constant coefficient is -3.45.
2. The estimated coefficient on V4 is 0.89.
3. Yes, the V4 coefficient is significant, because the p-value is much smaller than 0.05.
4. The maximum rate of change of the probability is 0.22.
